title: Activision CEO Bobby Kotick Steps Down From Coca-Cola Board
sub_head: The boss of the videogame publisher has served as a director for the drinks company since 2012
body:
Coca-Cola Co. said Activision Blizzard Inc. Chief Executive Bobby Kotick won’t stand for re-election to its board of directors.
“We appreciate Bobby’s decade of service to our company,” Coca-Cola CEO James Quincey said in a Friday statement.
